revised_title: Coefficients of Expansion of Lead Di-Iodide and Lead Silver Iodide Alloy
tldr: The author studied the coefficients of expansion of lead di-iodide and an alloy of lead and silver iodide. They found that the iodide of lead has three coefficients of expansion, while the lead silver iodide alloy contracts when heated before expanding again at higher temperatures. The author also compared the alloy's properties to those of other iodide compounds.
